chapter.title: CouchDB support
chapter.para: One of the document stores supported by DATADOC isCouchDB.

section.title: CouchDB Requirements
section.para: DATADOC requires Couchdb version 1.0 or later.

section.title: CouchDB Support High Level View
section.para: The CouchDB support is still under development and not part of this release.

section.title: Roadmap ahead
section.para:
The Spring Data Document projects CouchDB support is in its early stages. We are interested in feedback, knowing what your use cases are, what are the common patters you encounter so that the CouchDB module better serves your needs. Do contact us using the channels mentioned
above, we are interested in hearing from you!
